author: Julian Shen-Berro
title: Panda Express employees say they've faced racism amid coronavirus pandemic
description: "I thought for a second, 'Am I not American enough for you?'" one employee said. "This is the only country I have ever known."
content: A Panda Express employee was driving to work in mid March when a truck began speeding up and honking repeatedly. The employee, who was driving a company-branded car, said the truck's driver then raised his middle finger and said, "Go back to your country," be… [+3683 chars]
